00011 // single.cpp*
00012 #include "volume.h"
00013 #include "transport.h"
00014 #include "scene.h"
00015 // SingleScattering Declarations
00016 class SingleScattering : public VolumeIntegrator {
00017 public:
00018         // SingleScattering Public Methods
00019         SingleScattering(float ss) { stepSize = ss; }
00020         Spectrum Transmittance(const Scene *, const Ray &ray,
00021                 const Sample *sample, float *alpha) const;
00022         void RequestSamples(Sample *sample, const Scene *scene);
00023         Spectrum Li(const Scene *, const RayDifferential &ray, const Sample *sample, float *alpha) const;
00024 private:
00025         // SingleScattering Private Data
00026         float stepSize;
00027         int tauSampleOffset, scatterSampleOffset;
00028 };
00029 // SingleScattering Method Definitions
00030 void SingleScattering::RequestSamples(Sample *sample,
00031                 const Scene *scene) {
00032         tauSampleOffset = sample->Add1D(1);
00033         scatterSampleOffset = sample->Add1D(1);
00034 }
00035 Spectrum SingleScattering::Transmittance(const Scene *scene,
00036                 const Ray &ray, const Sample *sample, float *alpha) const {
00037         if (!scene->volumeRegion) return Spectrum(1.f);
00038         float step = sample ? stepSize : 4.f * stepSize;
00039         float offset = sample ? sample->oneD[tauSampleOffset][0] :
00040                 RandomFloat();
00041         Spectrum tau = scene->volumeRegion->Tau(ray, step, offset);
00042         return Exp(-tau);
00043 }
00044 Spectrum SingleScattering::Li(const Scene *scene,
00045                 const RayDifferential &ray, const Sample *sample,
00046                 float *alpha) const {
00047         VolumeRegion *vr = scene->volumeRegion;
00048         float t0, t1;
00049         if (!vr || !vr->IntersectP(ray, &t0, &t1)) return 0.f;
00050         // Do single scattering volume integration in _vr_
00051         Spectrum Lv(0.);
00052         // Prepare for volume integration stepping
00053         int N = Ceil2Int((t1-t0) / stepSize);
00054         float step = (t1 - t0) / N;
00055         Spectrum Tr(1.f);
00056         Point p = ray(t0), pPrev;
00057         Vector w = -ray.d;
00058         if (sample)
00059                 t0 += sample->oneD[scatterSampleOffset][0] * step;
00060         else
00061                 t0 += RandomFloat() * step;
00062         // Compute sample patterns for single scattering samples
00063         float *samp = (float *)alloca(3 * N * sizeof(float));
00064         LatinHypercube(samp, N, 3);
00065         int sampOffset = 0;
00066         for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i, t0 += step) {
00067                 // Advance to sample at _t0_ and update _T_
00068                 pPrev = p;
00069                 p = ray(t0);
00070                 Spectrum stepTau = vr->Tau(Ray(pPrev, p - pPrev, 0, 1),
00071                         .5f * stepSize, RandomFloat());
00072                 Tr *= Exp(-stepTau);
00073                 // Possibly terminate raymarching if transmittance is small
00074                 if (Tr.y() < 1e-3) {
00075                         const float continueProb = .5f;
00076                         if (RandomFloat() > continueProb) break;
00077                         Tr /= continueProb;
00078                 }
00079                 // Compute single-scattering source term at _p_
00080                 Lv += Tr * vr->Lve(p, w);
00081                 Spectrum ss = vr->sigma_s(p, w);
00082                 if (!ss.Black()) {
00083                         int nLights = scene->lights.size();
00084                         int lightNum =
00085                                 min(Floor2Int(samp[sampOffset] * nLights),
00086                                     nLights-1);
00087                         Light *light = scene->lights[lightNum];
00088                         // Add contribution of _light_ due to scattering at _p_
00089                         float pdf;
00090                         VisibilityTester vis;
00091                         Vector wo;
00092                         float u1 = samp[sampOffset+1], u2 = samp[sampOffset+2];
00093                         Spectrum L = light->Sample_L(p, u1, u2, &wo, &pdf, &vis);
00094                         if (!L.Black() && pdf > 0.f && vis.Unoccluded(scene)) {
00095                                 Spectrum Ld = L * vis.Transmittance(scene);
00096                                 Lv += Tr * ss * vr->p(p, w, -wo) *
00097                                       Ld * float(nLights) / pdf;
00098                         }
00099                 }
00100                 sampOffset += 3;
00101         }
00102         return Lv * step;
00103 }
00104 extern "C" DLLEXPORT VolumeIntegrator *CreateVolumeIntegrator(const ParamSet &params) {
00105         float stepSize  = params.FindOneFloat("stepsize", 1.f);
00106         return new SingleScattering(stepSize);
00107 }
